metadata.name: Metaverse Verified
metadata.description:
The metaverse is a new and scary place... nobody knows which platform will last, who to trust or even who is who in this wild and wacky new world. Well at least NeonGlitch86 and Eclectic Method can offer you some sort of verification.

Metaverse Verified is a status symbol for the metaverse.

DISCLAIMER: this NFT will not guarantee any associated privileges all implied utility is entirely theoretical.
